title: Supply Chain webinar: recording now available

content.text: On 13 August 2021, the Medicines & Healthcare products Regulatory Agency (MHRA) held a webinar to provide information and guidance around the challenges we all face protecting the medicines supply chain from falsified medicines and to share real case studies of incidents we have been addressing.
The live event was attended by a large number of delegates. For those of you who could not make it, the recording of the webinar is available to view on our MHRAgovuk YouTube channel.
You can also view our previous related blog post, which has been updated to address some key questions received during the webinar.
